settings.title:
Our Technology

& Solution -

in more detail
settings.subtitle: SOSense is a high-tech hydroponic sensor that detects all pool entries & accidents.
settings.text: Alerting you of pool entries and drownings faster than any other device on the market. The alarm sounds throughout your yard, your home and on your mobile phone, so wherever you may be, you will be notified, so that you are able to take immediate action.

settings.title: About The Company
settings.subtitle:
SOSense. We save lives.

It’s in our name.
settings.text: SOSense is the tech-lifeguard that everyone needs as a non-negotiable addition to their swimming pool.
Did you know that DROWNING is the 3rd leading cause of unintentional injury deaths worldwide, accounting for 7% of all injury-related deaths?
It is also the third leading cause of all deaths worldwide for those aged between 5 and 14 years old.
Drowning can happen anytime, to anyone and it happens more frequently than you’d like to imagine.

1,000 children die every year from drowning, with more than half of those, aged 1 to 4, drowning in home swimming pools. The reality of pool safety is that it is your responsibility to take preventative measures, otherwise it could just be too late.

settings.title: The Team
settings.text: The SOSense team is made up of professionals that are the best of the best in their respective fields, ensuring that every aspect of the SOSense pool entry alarm unit is of supreme quality, so that the final product is  a one-of-a-kind, state-of-the-art technology unlike any other pool entry unit available on the market to date.
